articles.title: Grand Opening
articles.paragraph: Grand Opening celebration going on now at Delectorium. Come in and meet us. We would love an opportunity to show you what we are passionate about.
articles.summary: We have put a lot of work into this project and hope to see you here!

articles.title: Welcome to the Batcave!
articles.paragraph: One of our passions is to travel and bring back, not only new flavors and recipes, but entire experiences. We recently had the opportunity to cater an event inside Hollywood's new underground event center. It was great. We were able to bring in some cultural effects from our travel and the overall event was an amazing success.
articles.summary: If you have a crazy idea - we will help you make it happen.

articles.title: Friday Night Specials
articles.short: We have a couples/partners special running every Friday.
articles.paragraph: Two friends, couples, partners... Maybe three or four friends. Bring all your partners in for our Friday night special. Let us pick the dish and every other person at your table dines free!
articles.summary: Of course, we will work within your dietary constraints on any dish we make.
